}} [http://www.iptime.co.kr/~iptime/prd.php?pf=3&page=&pt=194&pd=1 Product page] :'''EFM Networks''''s product page states the device has 8 MB Flash and 64 MB RAM. :The release is specified as being in June 2013. :The KCC regulatory ID of the router is '''KCC-CMM-EFM-IPTIMEA2004NS'''. :Additional specs noted... :*Dimensions: [[Dimensions::182.5 mm x 133.5 mm x 26 mm]] :*Weight: [[Weight::342 g]] [http://max1013.tistory.com/entry/ipTIME-A2004NS-REIVEW-1 Review on '''max1013.tistory.com'''] (specs are derived from this review, it's dated 2013-07-23) :"04227C" appears to be silkscreened on the board. :The power adapter shown bundled with the device is a '''FAIRONE Electronics''' FBGD1202000K (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.7A -> 12VDC, 2.0A). :The product code on the box is 8809228971763. [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ENkumPe0LC4 Some YouTube (''ShoppingDaNaWa'''s channel) video about the device] (published 2013-06-25) This device is presumed to be using RTL8812AR for the 11ac radio. {{WiFiCert|WFA19863|06/03/2013}} {{lowercase}}
